chapter.text: 54|1|Kiyamata nikatararti haiche arau candra bidirna haiche
54|2|arau sihamte kono nidarsana dekhile mukha ghuraa'i laya arau kaya, ‘eyato ciraacaraita yadu’.
54|3|Arau sihamte asbikara karae arau nija nija prabrttira anusarana karae, athaca pratito bisaye'i sesa laksyata upanita ha’ba.
54|4|Arau sihamtara ocarata sambadasamuha ahi pa'iche, ya’ta ache satarkabani
54|5|eta paraipurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana sihamtara kono kamata aha na'i.
54|6|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa. (Smarana karaa) yidina ahbanakaraiye ahbana karaiba eta bhayaraha parainamara phale
54|7|apamanita aranamita nayanerae se'idina sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta pharainahe
54|8|sihamte ahbanakaraira phale bhita-santrasta arasthata guci ahiba. Kaphirasakale ka’ba, ‘e'ito bara kathina dina’.
54|9|Ihamtara purbe nuhara sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila-- eteke sihamte amara bandaka asbikara karaichila arau kaichila, ‘e'om ejana baliya’, arau te'omka bhiti pradarsana karaa haichila.
54|10|Tetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya ma'i asahaya, eteke tumiye'i iyara pratisodha grahana karaa’.
54|11|Phalata ami dharaasara barasunasaha akasara duraarasamuha khuli dilo
54|12|arau matira paraa jharnasamuha utsaraita karailo; phalata gote'i pani milita ha’la eta paraikalpana anusarae.
54|13|Arau ami taka (nuhaka) katha arau peraeka nirmita nauyanata araohana karaalo.
54|14|Yito amara cakura sanmukhata calichila, e'ito puraskara tara babe yaka pratyakhyana karaa haichila.
54|15|Arau niscaya ami iyaka nidarsanaraupe raakhi dicho; eteke achene konoba upadesa grahanakarai
54|16|eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|17|arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|18|ada sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila, eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|19|Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata pathiya'ichilo pracanda sitala dhumuha nirabicchinna amangala dinata
54|20|se'i dhumuha'i manuhaka utkhata karaichila, yena sihamta ughali paraa khejura gachara kanda.
54|21|Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|22|arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|23|chamuda sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila.
54|24|Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami amara majarae'i ejana byaktira anusarana karaima neki? Eneha’le ami pathabhrastatata arau unmattatata patita hama.
54|25|Amara majara paraa e'omra prati upadesabani praerana karaa haiche neki? Nahaya, si ejana michaliya, dambhika’.
54|26|Ahakali niscaya sihamte gama paba, kona carama michaliya, dambhika.
54|27|Niscaya ami sihamtara babe paraiksasbaraupa uta patha'i acho, eteke tumi sihamtara bisaye apeksa karaa arau dhairyadharana karaa.
54|28|Arau sihamtaka jana'i diya ye, sihamtara majata pani bantana sunirdista. Pratyeke'i nijara pala mate panira ansata upasthita ha’ba.
54|29|Tara pichata sihamte sihamtara sangika mati anile arau si utajanika dharai hatya karaile.
54|30|Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|31|niscaya ami sihamtara prati pathiya'ichilo eta pracanda sabda, phalata sihamta gohali saja sukana khandita kharaira darae hai ga’la.
54|32|Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|33|luta sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila.
54|34|Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata sila bahanakarai pracanda dhumuha pathiya'ichilo, kerala luta paraiyalara bahirae; te'omlokaka ami ud'dhara karaichilo raatira sesansata
54|35|amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa. Yiye krtajnata prakasa karae, ami taka enekaiye pratidana di'om.
54|36|Arau niscaya lute sihamtaka amara kathina sastira paraa satarka karaichila, tathapi'o sihamte saradhana bani samparke sandeha posana karaichila.

54|37|Arau niscaya sihamte lutara paraa te'omra atithisakalara paraa asat uddesya dabi karaile, tetiya ami sihamtara drsti lopa karai dilo (arau ka’lo), mora sasti arau saradhana banira soraada loraa.
54|38|Arau niscaya puraa dokamukalite sihamtara oparata biraamahina sasti nami ahichila.
54|39|‘Eteke mora sasti arau saradhana banira parainama bhoga karaa’.
54|40|Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|41|arau niscaya phira'a'una gosthira ocarato satarkakarai ahichila
54|42|sihamte amara sakalo nidarsanake asbikara karaile, eteke ami mahaparaakramasali arau sarbasaktimanaraupe sihamtaka dharailo.
54|43|Tomalokara majara kaphirasakala se'isakala kaphiratakai uttama neki? Ne tomalokara babe purbararti kitabata kono muktira ghosana ache
54|44|ne sihamte kaya, ‘ami sanghabad'dha aparaajaya dala’
54|45|e'i dala anatipalame paraajita ha’ba arau pitha dekhuraa'i palayana karaiba
54|46|baram kiyamata sihamtara sastira nirdharaita samaya; arau kiyamata haiche ati bhayaraha arau tiktakara
54|47|niscaya aparaadhisakala bibhraanti arau sastita ache.
54|48|Yidina sihamtaka naka comcaraa'i tani jahannamata lai yoraa ha’ba (se'i dina koraa ha’ba) ‘etiya jahannamara sparsa bhoga karaa’.
54|49|Niscaya ami pratito bastu eta nirdharaita paraimapata srsti karaicho.
54|50|Arau amara adesa kerala eta katha, cakura palakara darae.
54|51|Arau ami tomalokara darae bahutake dhbansa karaicho; eteke upadesa grahanakarai konoba achene
54|52|arau sihamte yi karaiche, se'i sakalo ‘amalanamata’ (lipibad'dha) ache
54|53|arau sakalo sarau-bara katha likhita ache.
54|54|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba baga-bagica arau nijaraasamuhara majata
54|55|yathayogya asanata, sarbasaktimana maha adhipati (allaha)ra sannidhyata.
